resources.string: 请输入用户名或注册email或手机号
抱歉,只有收入和支出记录可以编辑

select count(*) as cnt,sum(amount) amount,round(sum(amount*interest_rate_min/100/365*(julianday(repayment_ending_date)-julianday(invest_date))),2) interest from user_invest_record where invest_date>=? and invest_date<=? and invest_status=\'投资中\'
select * from user_invest_record where invest_date>=? and invest_date<=? and invest_status=\'投资中\' order by invest_id desc

select count(*) as cnt,sum(amount) as amount,round(sum(amount*interest_rate_min/100/365*(julianday(repayment_ending_date)-julianday(invest_date))),2) as interest from user_invest_record where repayment_ending_date<=? and repayment_ending_date<=? and invest_status=\'投资中\'
select * from user_invest_record where repayment_ending_date<=? and repayment_ending_date<=? and invest_status=\'投资中\' order by invest_id desc

select count(*) as cnt,sum(amount) amount,round(sum(amount*interest_rate_min/100/365*(julianday(repayment_ending_date)-julianday(invest_date))),2) interest from user_invest_record where repayment_ending_date>? and repayment_ending_date<=? and invest_status=\'投资中\'
select * from user_invest_record where repayment_ending_date>? and repayment_ending_date<=? and invest_status=\'投资中\' order by invest_id desc

select count(1) cnt,sum(amount) amount,round(sum(amount*interest_rate_min)/sum(amount),2) as avg_interest_rate,round(sum(amount*interest_rate_max)/sum(amount),2) as avg_interest_rate_max from user_invest_record
select * from user_invest_record order by invest_date desc,invest_id desc

select * from (select p2p_channel_name,count(*) cnt,sum(amount) amount from user_invest_record where invest_date>=? and invest_date<=? and invest_status=\'投资中\' group by p2p_channel_name) order by amount desc limit 8

select * from (select round(interest_rate_min,0) interest,count(*) cnt,sum(amount) amount from user_invest_record where invest_status=\'投资中\' group by round(interest_rate_min,0)) order by amount desc limit 8
select * from (select substr(invest_date,6,2) months,count(*) cnt,sum(amount) amount from user_invest_record where invest_status=\'投资中\' group by substr(invest_date,6,2)) order by amount desc limit 8

select * from (select substr(repayment_ending_date,6,2) months,count(*) cnt,sum(amount) amount from user_invest_record where invest_status=\'投资中\' group by substr(repayment_ending_date,6,2)) order by amount desc limit 8
select * from user_channel_curr_amount order by amount desc
